name: 內燃機特論
description: 內燃機之機械構造及分類、引擎基本循環、引擎的設計、引擎的操作參數、引擎運轉循環的理想模型、引擎運轉循環的理想模型、熱化學與燃料、替代燃料、空氣與燃料供應系統、燃燒室內之流體流動、燃燒、排氣流動、引擎污染排放與控制、引擎熱傳遞、摩擦與潤滑、內燃機未來之發展趨勢與替代技術。
goals: 培養對於內燃機之之分類、構造、設計參數等進行探討
syllabus:
1\. Thermochemistry of Fuel-Air Mixtures

2\. Composition and Analyses of Exhaust Gases

3\. Gas Exchange Processes

4\. Charge Motion within Cylinder

5\. Combustion in Spark-Ignition Engines

6\. Combustion in Compression-Ignition Engines

7\. Engine Heat Transfer

8\. Engine Operating Characteristics

9\. Pollutant Formation and Control

10\. Introduction to dynamometer and test cell

11\. Measurement of torque, power, speed and fuel consumption

12\. Data analysis and report

13\. Engine design and selection

14\. Engine and dynamometer maintenance

15\. Overall engine performance
